name: Global Partners LP
description: Global Partners LP is a leading energy and logistics company specializing in the supply and distribution of refined petroleum products. Established in 2005 and headquartered in Waltham, Massachusetts, the company operates a vast network of fuel terminals, convenience stores, and transportation services across the northeastern United States. Global Partners is committed to providing reliable energy solutions to its customers while ensuring the highest standards of safety and environmental responsibility. The company has a diverse portfolio that includes wholesale distribution of gasoline, diesel, and heating oil, as well as retail operations through its network of convenience stores and gas stations. Global Partners also engages in renewable energy initiatives, investing in biofuels and sustainable energy solutions to reduce its carbon footprint and support the transition to cleaner energy sources. With a strong focus on operational excellence, customer satisfaction, and community engagement, Global Partners continues to grow and adapt in the dynamic energy landscape. The company’s mission is to deliver superior energy products and services while maintaining a commitment to sustainability and corporate responsibility.
